devdoc.details: Gerencia Cofres (Vaults) para mintar StableToken (aUSD) contra colateral (ETH nativo) de forma sobrecolateralizada. Este  um MVP e omite taxas de estabilidade e liquidaes.

depositAndMint(uint256).details: Deposita ETH como colateral e opcionalmente minta aUSD.

getCollateralValueUSD(uint256).details: Retorna o valor do colateral em USD (com 18 decimais).

getHealthFactor(address).details: Retorna o fator de sade do cofre. Health Factor = (Colateral_USD * BPS) / (Dvida_USD * Limite_Liquidao) Se HF > 10_000 (BPS), est seguro. Se HF <= 10_000 (BPS), est sujeito a liquidao.

getNormalizedPrice().details: Normaliza o preo do orculo para 1e18.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repayAndWithdraw(uint256,uint256).details: Paga a dvida (aUSD) e opcionalmente retira o colateral (ETH). O usurio DEVE aprovar o aUSD para este contrato primeiro.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: VaultManager
